SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB AS ocd WHERE ocd.PROVE_STATE = '1'
AND ocd.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN = #{sc_type}
AND ocd.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN IN ('03', '04')
AND ( ocd.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' OR ocd.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' OR ocd.QUST_CNTN LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' )

SELECT A.DB_SEQ, A.TITLE, SUBSTR(A.REG_DATE, 1, 4) ||'-' || SUBSTR(A.REG_DATE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.REG_DATE, 7, 2) REG_DATE, A.VIEW_CNT, A.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.SC_FILES AS sfl WHERE sfl.PARENT_SEQ = A.DB_SEQ||'') = 0 THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS FILE_YN FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ocd.REG_DATE DESC, ocd.DB_SEQ DESC) AS ROWNUM, ocd.DB_SEQ, ocd.TITLE, ocd.REG_DATE, ocd.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN, ocd.VIEW_CNT FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB as ocd WHERE ocd.PROVE_STATE = '1'
AND ocd.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN = #{sc_type}
AND ocd.CONTACT_DB_GUBUN IN ('03', '04')
AND ( ocd.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' OR ocd.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' OR ocd.QUST_CNTN LIKE '%' || #{sc_text} || '%' )
ORDER BY ocd.REG_DATE DESC, ocd.DB_SEQ DESC ) AS A WHERE A.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{start_index} + 1 AND #{start_index} + #{page_size} ORDER BY A.ROWNUM ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB AS ocd SET ocd.VIEW_CNT = ocd.VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE ocd.DB_SEQ = #{db_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT ocd.DB_SEQ, ocd.TITLE, SUBSTR(ocd.REG_DATE, 1, 4) ||'-' || SUBSTR(ocd.REG_DATE, 5, 2) || '-' || SUBSTR(ocd.REG_DATE, 7, 2) REG_DATE, ocd.VIEW_CNT, ocd.QUST_CNTN, ocd.CONTENT FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.OM_CONTACT_DB AS ocd WHERE ocd.DB_SEQ = #{db_seq}

SELECT sfl.SEQ, sfl.PARENT_SEQ, sfl.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(sfl.REG_DATE,'%Y%m%d') as REG_DATE FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.SC_FILES as sfl WHERE sfl.PARENT_SEQ = #{db_seq} || '' ORDER BY sfl.REG_DATE ASC
SELECT sfl.FILE_NAME, sfl.ORIGINAL_FILE_NAME, sfl.REAL_PATH as UPLOAD_PATH FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.SC_FILES as sfl WHERE sfl.SEQ = #{num}
